verses.verse: Do you indeed <S%H552><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> silent ones? <S%H482><s%> Do you judge <S%H8199><s%> blamelessly, <S%H4339><s%> you sons <S%H1121><s%> of men? <S%H120><s%>
No, <S%H3820><s%> in your heart you plot <S%H6466><s%> injustice. <S%H5766><s%> You measure <S%H6424><s%> out the violence <S%H2555><s%> of your hands <S%H3027><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> go astray <S%H2114><s%> from the womb. <S%H7358><s%> They are wayward <S%H8582><s%> as soon as they are born, <S%H990><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> lies. <S%H3577><s%>
Their poison <S%H2534><s%> is like <S%H1823><s%> the poison <S%H2534><s%> of a snake; <S%H5175><s%> like a deaf <S%H2795><s%> cobra <S%H6620><s%> that stops <S%H331><s%> its ear, <S%H241><s%>
which doesn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of charmers, <S%H3907><s%> no matter how skillful <S%H2449><s%> the charmer may be. <S%H2266><s%>

Break <S%H2040><s%> their teeth, <S%H8127><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> in their mouth. <S%H6310><s%> Break out <S%H5422><s%> the great teeth <S%H4459><s%> of the young lions, <S%H3715><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Let them vanish as water <S%H4325><s%> that flows <S%H1980><s%> away. <S%H3988><s%> When they draw <S%H1869><s%> the bow, <S%H2671><s%> let their arrows be made blunt. <S%H4135><s%>

Let them be like a snail <S%H7642><s%> which melts <S%H8557><s%> and passes away, <S%H1980><s%> like the stillborn <S%H5309><s%> child, <S%H802><s%> who has not seen <S%H2372><s%> the sun. <S%H8121><s%>
Before your pots <S%H5518><s%> can feel <S%H995><s%> the heat of the thorns, <S%H329><s%> he will sweep <S%H8175><s%> away the green <S%H2416><s%> and the burning alike. <S%H2740><s%>

The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> when he sees <S%H2372><s%> the vengeance. <S%H5359><s%> He shall wash <S%H7364><s%> his feet <S%H6471><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the wicked; <S%H7563><s%>

so that men <S%H120><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> "Most certainly there is a reward <S%H6529><s%> for the righteous. <S%H6662><s%> Most certainly there is <S%H3426><s%> a God <S%H430><s%> who judges <S%H8199><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>"
